original_title: Viva Ibiza! 3: Hot Young Lovers on Holiday
overview: While on holiday, these hot young men find loads of time to frolic outdoors and to play indoors. Whether its exchanging sweet blowjobs by the swimming pool, hot fucking in the garden or having a scorching threeway by the fireplace, these boys do it all and you'll enjoy every moment of their travelogue. Viva Ibiza! Three, like it's predecessors, is a beautifully filmed, creamy sex-travaganza that will have you on the next available flight to glorious Ibiza in no time!
title: Viva Ibiza! 3: Hot Young Lovers on Holiday
